answers.answer: I'm assuming they're talking about gestational diabetes. Did you take the 1 hour test? If so, you might have just failed that. If you did, it's not terrible because they'll have you do a 3 hour test and you could pass that. More or less just watch your diet and intakes. Sorry I can't be of more help. I'm sure someone else who has/had it will be able to tell you better of what to cut out and eat.

question: Hey well midwife rang and left msg that I have to go for another test to make sure I don't have diabetes, I'm really worried now I've been eating chocolate but I didn't think that much, I'm not a big person I started out at 42 kg and I'm nearly 50kg and I'm 27 weeks today.Does any one have any advice and if I change things now will it go away I feel terrible x
title: May have Diabetes any help or advice
